thread.title: Michelle Williams, Ruth Negga are cool girl chic at Oscar Nominees Luncheon
thread.title_full: Michelle Williams, Ruth Negga are cool girl chic at Oscar Nominees Luncheon

author: USA TODAY
title: Michelle Williams, Ruth Negga are cool girl chic at Oscar Nominees Luncheon
text:
Michelle Williams, Ruth Negga are cool girl chic at Oscar Nominees Luncheon Erin Jensen, USA TODAY 10:51 a.m. ET Feb. 7, 2017 
If there was a best dressed crown to be given away at Monday's Oscar Nominees Luncheon we'd have to break it up into pieces Ã  la Cady Heron in Mean Girls . The first two pieces would go to Ruth Negga and Michelle Williams. 
Negga gave off vintage vibes in Miu Miu, wearing a short-sleeved sweater embroidered with dainty pink flowers and an A-line skirt paired with pastel accessories. 
This is what nailing it looks like. (Photo: Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY) 
Williams looked very mod in a geometric, one-shoulder design by Louis Vuitton and platinum locks. 
Just peachy. (Photo: Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY) 
We'd give pieces of the crown to these actors whose style was also on point.
